name: Banking it EAJY!
description:
Defeat Yukkuris to gain EXP and level up! Every level gives you options to choose new weapons, upgrade existing ones or even add additional Sekibanki heads. Survive the Yukkuri onslaught for as long as possible. Remember to take it eajy ne!

====

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys
Strafe - Left Shift

====
